name: Pirate's Greed (LDJAM42)
description:
Hey you, traveler! Ready to help one unlucky pirate to reach his island and avoid sinking in the sea on the ship full of treasures? Sure you do! So don't waste your time and help this poor guy to survive! Meanwhile, the parrot will tell you some jokes to make this 3-minute journey unforgettable!

Push/throw treasures from the ship, but don't forget to leave some treasures as well (pirate will be thankful). 

But be careful, don't let the ship sink under the weight of treasures, always check ship overload level (grey slider on the top left side).

I wish you a good luck, traveler!

Controls (are changeable from the settings ): 

AWSD - movement

Left Mouse - grab a treasure

Right Mouse - throw a treasure

Left Shift - restart
